buyNft(address,uint256).details: This function buy the NFT with the given price

cancelListing(address,uint256).details: This function cancel the listing of the NFT

listNft(address,uint256,uint256).details: This function list the NFT with the given price

updateListing(address,uint256,uint256).details: This function update the listing of the NFT with the new price

withdrawProceeds().details: This function withdraw the proceeds of the seller

cancelListing(address,uint256).notice: Cancel the listing of an NFT

updateListing(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Update the listing of an NFT
